        public ContainerMenu(GameScreen gameScreen,
             com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage stage,
             decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.containers.Container container)
        This class is used for creating a UI for containers such as chests, and the inventory
        Parameters:
        gameScreen - - The game
        stage - - The stage on which to place the window
        container - - The container tocreate a UI for.

      • calculateButtonSize

        protected float calculateButtonSize(int width,
                        int height)
        Calculates the optimum button size for the item grid.
        Parameters:
        width - - Number of buttons across.
        height - - Number of buttons from top to bottom.
        Returns:
        - The optimal size.

      • createItemGrid

        protected void createItemGrid()
        Creates all the buttons that are connected to the inventory an a grid.

      • createItemButton

        protected void createItemButton(float x,
                    float y,
                    decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.itemBase.PlayerItem item,
                    int ContainerPosition)
        Create a button that is linked to the inventory slot, and adds a listener to it.
        Parameters:
        x - - The x grid position.
        y - - The y grid position.
        item - - The item that goes in the slot.
        ContainerPosition - - The position within the container the item corresponds to.

      • handleItemClick

        protected void handleItemClick(float x,
                   float y,
                   ContainerMenu.ItemButton button)
        Handles the player clicking an inventory slot, it will switch the item that is attached to the mouse, and the item that is in the slot.
        Parameters:
        x - - - The mouse x.
        y - - The mouse y.
        button - - The button that activated this event.
